name: COVID19CVXValueSets
title: COVID 19 CVX Value Sets
description: This is a collection of CVX value sets related to COVID-19. These value sets are curated by Clinical Architecture on behalf of CareEvolution, MITRE, SNOMED, and other COVID-19 Interoperability Alliance (https://covid19ia.org) collaborators.
